abstract: In my joint paper (Parikh and Väänänen in Ann Pure Appl Log 134(1):83–93, 2005) with Rohit Parikh we investigate a logic arising from finite information. Here we consider another kind of limited information, namely information with a small number of errors, and prove a related completeness theorem. We point out that this approach naturally leads to considering multi-teams in the team semantics that lies behind (Parikh and Väänänen 2005).
meta: In book: Rohit Parikh on Logic, Language and Society
